channel.title: Blog on Gosub
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Gosub

item.title: Why Gosub exists
item.description: The spark: building instead of protesting A few years ago, I grew deeply frustrated with the state of the current IT and technology landscape. Monopolies are everywhere, with massive companies shaping the internet for their shareholders rather than for users. Since I’m not the type of person to organize protest marches or rally a crowd, my options for doing something about it felt very limited. But I’m a programmer… I can do programming stuff.
